Module atu.aicme4j
Package jhealy.aicme4j.net

Class NeuralNetwork

java.lang.Object
jhealy.aicme4j.net.NeuralNetwork
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class NeuralNetwork extends Object implements Serializable
A multi-layer feed-forward neural network that can learn using supervised training. This implementation is effectively a wrapper class for an array of NeuralNetwork.Layer instances that represent the network. A valid instance of NeuralNetwork must have a minimum of three layers: an input layer, a hidden layer and an output layer. Inputs to the neural network consist of a vector of doubles in an array provided as a parameter to process. The input vector may or may not be normalized. The output of the neural network is a single double representing the index of the output layer containing the highest weighted value.
Since:
Aicme4j 1.0
Author:
Dr. John Healy, ATU.
See Also:

      protected NeuralNetwork(NeuralNetwork.Layer[] layers, boolean softmax)
      Constructs a neural network with an array of layers and an optional softmax option.
      Parameters:
      layers - configured input, hidden and output layers
      softmax - converts the output into a probability distribution

    • getOutputLayer

      public double[] getOutputLayer()
      Returns the output layer of the neural network as a vector of doubles. If the softmax option is set to true, the vector returned will have been converted into a probability distribution.
      Returns:
      the output layer of the neural network as a vector of doubles

    • feedForward

      protected void feedForward(double[] vector) throws Exception
      Pass the input vector of values through each layer of the neural network and compute a result.
      Parameters:
      vector - the input vector to the neural network
      Throws:
      Exception - if the neural network has not been correctly configured or trained

    • process

      public double process(double[] vector, Output out) throws Exception
      Process an input vector by feeding it through the neural network, computing a result and returning the index of the output layer with the highest weighted value.
      Parameters:
      vector - the input vector to the neural network
      out - the transformation to apply to the highest weighted element in the output layer
      Returns:
      the index of the output layer with the highest weighted value
      Throws:
      Exception - if the neural network has not been correctly configured or trained

    • addTrainingStats

      protected void addTrainingStats(TrainingStatistics stats)
      Provide the neural network model with the statistics from its training.
      Parameters:
      stats - the set of hyperparameters and metrics from the backpropagation training

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns the topography of the neural network and its training statistics, including the values of each layer, the weights for each layer and the hyperparameters / metrics from training. This method is intended to be used as a debugging and learning feature.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
